Rotorsystem_class¶

This is the +AMrotorSIM module.

+AMrotorSIM is a really cool module.

class +AMrotorSIM.@Rotorsystem.Rotorsystem(c, name)¶

Bases: handle

Rotorsystem Basis class for a rotor system. R=ROTORSYSTEM(cnfg,’System’);

See also AMrotorSIM.Experiments, AMrotorSIM.Graphs, AMrotorSIM.Dataoutput, AMrotorTools.

cnfg = 'struct([])'¶

configure struct, typically created in seperate Config_ script

components = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.pidControllers.pidController

loads = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Components.Component

name = None¶

name of the rotorsystem

pidControllers = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.activeMagneticBearing

rotor = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Sensors

sensors = None¶

See also AMrotorSIM.Loads

systemmatrices = None¶

in urspr�nglicher Form obsolet, wieder hinzugefuegt, damit die Zeitintegration erst einmal funktioniert. fuer speichern der systemloads

class +AMrotorSIM.@activeMagneticBearing.activeMagneticBearing(cnfg)¶

Bases: handle

activeMagneticBearing Class for AMB Creates other objects of the type SimpleBearing and pidController
